name: Chicken or Egg
description:
A game to convince whether the chicken or the egg came first! The game is #teamEgg and it is recommended for #teamChicken to play.

The game consists of 3 obstacle courses for the time machine to navigate through, and 2 exploration levels. For the obstacles courses,  avoid the pond, crocodiles, and pterodactyl because they are your enemies! The time machine accelerates as it goes on. The hills will slow you down and provide spots to hide from your enemies.

Controls:  W, A, S, D for moving
